drinks.name: Nutcracker Ale
drinks.description: Nutcracker Ale is Boulevardâ€™s holiday gift for real beer lovers. This hearty, warming brew is a classic winter ale, deep amber in color, with hints of molasses balanced by the spiciness of Chinook hops.

drinks.name: Dunkel
drinks.description: Dunkel is a full-bodied, brown, Munich-style lager with low bitterness and rich toasted-bread-crust and caramel malt flavors.
